scripts.build: npm run build:contract && npm run build:web
scripts.deploy: npm run build:contract && rm -rf neardev && near dev-deploy build/contract.wasm && export $(cat ./neardev/dev-account.env) && echo $CONTRACT_NAME && near call $CONTRACT_NAME init --accountId $CONTRACT_NAME
scripts.start: npm run deploy && echo The app is starting! && export $(cat ./neardev/dev-account.env) && echo $CONTRACT_NAME && parcel frontend/index.html --open
scripts.dev: npm run deploy && nodemon --watch contract -e ts --exec "npm run start"
